mapper.select: select * from GroupMemoList where chattingRoomId = #{gsId} and memberId = #{mId}
mapper.insert: insert into GroupMemoList(id, title, chattingRoomId, memberId) values((select coalesce(max(id),0)+1 from GroupMemoList), #{title}, #{chattingRoomId}, #{memberId})
mapper.update: update GroupMemoList set title = #{title}, chattingRoomId = #{chattingRoomId} where id = #{id} and memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: delete from GroupMemoList where id = #{id} and memberId = #{memberId}
